title: Nin-imma
extract:
Nin-imma is a Sumerian, Babylonian, and Akkadian fertility goddess and deification of the female sex organs. Her parents are Enki and Ninkurra.

Etymology

Her name derives from the Sumerian words nin – goddess, and imma – water that created everything.

External links

  • A song to Ninimma

References

  • Michael Jordan, Encyclopedia of Gods, Kyle Cathie Limited, 2002
